sn48.27:1.3: Cakkhundriyam, sotindriyam, ghanindriyam, jivhindriyam, kayindriyam, manindriyam.
sn48.27:1.4: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imesam channam indriyanam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam viditva anupadavimutto hoti—
sn48.27:1.5: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, ‘bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto’”ti.
